# llms.txt - Information for AI Language Models

# About Taru
Taru is an AI-powered educational platform that provides personalized learning experiences for students, parents, teachers, and organizations.

# Public Pages
Home: /
About Us: /about-us
Contact: /contact
Pricing: /pricing
Privacy Policy: /privacy-policy
Terms and Conditions: /terms-and-conditions
Career Details: /career-details
Career Exploration: /career-exploration
Login: /login
Register: /register
Diagnostic Assessment: /diagnostic-assessment
Interest Assessment: /interest-assessment
Skill Assessment: /skill-assessment
Curriculum Path: /curriculum-path
Recommended Modules: /recommended-modules

# Platform Features
- AI-powered learning assistant
- Personalized learning paths
- Career exploration tools
- Diagnostic and interest assessments
- Module-based curriculum
- Progress tracking
- Multi-role support (Student, Parent, Teacher, Admin)

# Technology Stack
- Frontend: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS 4
- Backend: Next.js API Routes
- Database: MongoDB
- Authentication: JWT

# Contact
For more information, visit /contact

2024
